changeSet.sql: create sequence shareholder_seq; create table if not exists shareholder ( id bigint not null constraint shareholder_pkey primary key, custom_profile_url varchar(255), description varchar(255), facebook_url varchar(255), invested_amount numeric(19,2), is_anonymous boolean, linkedin_url varchar(255), location varchar(255), name varchar(255), order_number smallint, photo_url varchar(255), twitter_url varchar(255), company_id bigint constraint shareholder_fk_on_company references company );
